intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: Where do you go with friends?
Where do you go to school?
What is your favorite family recipe?

respond_situations.description: You are in a clothing shop. A customer asks you about a shirt.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. The waiter asks you about your drink.

ask_situations.instruction: You need help with your homework. Ask your friend for help.
You are at a friend's house. You want to ask for a snack. ..
You want to buy a drink. Ask the shopkeeper for the price.

listening_script.text: I send messages to my friends. I use my phone. Messages are fun and quick. I like to chat. We talk every day.

questions.question: Who do I send messages to?

follow_up_questions.question: What is in your sports kit?
When do you use your sports kit?
Where do you keep your sports kit?
How do you feel about your sports kit?
